song.songtext:
<Label:Intro> [Ami][F][C][Emi7] [Ami] [F][C][G] [Ami][F][C][Emi7] [Ami] [F][G] [Ami][F][G]
<Label:Verse 1> Oh they [Ami]say people [F]come They [C]say people [Emi7]go this par[Ami]ticular [F]diamond was [C]extra spe[G]cial And though [Ami]you might be [F]gone And the [C]world may not [Emi7]know Still I [Ami]see you ce[F]lestial [G]
<Label:Instrumental> [Ami][F][C][G] [Ami][F][C][G]
Like a [Ami]lion you [F]ran a [C]goddess you [Emi7]rolled Like an [Ami]eagle you [F]circled in [C]perfect pur[G]ple So how [Ami]come things move [F]on? How [C]come cars don’t [Emi7]slow? When it [Ami]feels like the [F]end of my [G]world When I [Ami]should but I [F]can’t let you [G]go
<Label:Chorus 1> But when I’m [Ami]cold[F], [C]col[Emi7]d When I’m [Ami]cold[F], [C]col[G]d There’s a [Ami]light that you [F]give me When [C]I’m in sha[Emi7]dow There’s a [Ami]feeling you [F]give me, an [G]everglow
<Label:Instrumental> [Ami][F][C][G] [Ami][F][C][G]
<Label:Verse 2> Like [Ami]brothers in [F]blood [C]sisters who [Emi7]ride And we [Ami]swore on that [F]night We’d be [C]friends ‘til we [G]die But the [Ami]changing of [F]winds And the [C]way waters [Emi7]flow Life is [Ami]short as the [F]falling of [G]snow And now [Ami]I’m gonna [F]miss you, I [G]know
<Label:Chorus 2> When I’m [Ami]cold[F], [C]col[Emi7]d In water [Ami]roll[F]ed, [C]sal[G]t I know that [Ami]you’re always [F]with me And the [C]way you will [Emi7]show, and you’re [Ami]with me wher[F]ever I g[G]o and you [Ami]give me this [F]feeling, this [G]everglow
<Label:Bridge>[Ami][F][C][Emi7] [Ami][F][C][G] [Ami][F][C][Emi7]
oh- IIII
what I wouldn’t [Ami]give for just a [F]moment to [G]know Yeah, I [Ami]live for this [F]feeling, this [G]everglow
<Label:Outro> [Ami][F][C][Emi7] [Ami][F][C][G] So if [Ami]you love some[F]one, you should [C]let them [Emi7]know Oh, the [Ami]light that you [F]give me will ev[G]erglow
song.author: Coldplay
song.title: Everglow

song.songtext:
<Note1:capo 2>
<Label>1</Label> [Emi]Na dlani jednu z tvých řas, do tmy se [Ami]koukám, [D]hraju si písničky tvý, co jsem ti [G]psal, je skoro [Ami]půlnoc a z kostela [C]zvon mi noc při[Emi]pomíná, půjdu se [Ami]mejt a pozhasínám, co bude [H7]dál?
<Label>2</Label> Pod polštář dopisů pár, co poslalas, dávám, píšeš, že ráda mě máš a trápí tě stesk, je skoro půlnoc a z kostela zvon mi noc připomíná, půjdu se mejt a pozhasínám, co bude dál?
<Label>Ref</Label> Chtěl jsem to [Ami]ráno, kdy naposled snídal jsem s tebou, ti [Emi]říct, že už ti nezavolám, pro jednu pitomou [Ami]holku, pro pár nocí [D]touhy podved' jsem [G]všechno, o čem doma si [H7]sníš, teď je mi to [Emi]líto.
<Label>3</Label> Kolikrát člověk může mít rád tak opravdu z lásky, dvakrát či třikrát - to ne, i jednou je dost, je skoro půlnoc a z kostela zvon mi noc připomíná, půjdu se mejt a pozhasínám, co bude dál?
<Label>Ref</Label> Chtěl jsem to ráno... 2x
song.author: Nedvědi
song.title: Podvod

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 4>
<Label:Intro> [Ami7] [G/H] [C] [Ami7] [G/H] [C] [Ami7] [G/H] [C] [Ami7] [G/H] [C]
<Label:Verse> [Ami7]I know a [G/H]man with [C]nothing in his hands, [Ami7]Nothing but a [G/H]rolling [C]stone [Ami7]He told me [G/H]'bout when his [C]house burnt down, [Ami7]He lost every[G/H]thing he ow[C]ned [Ami7]He lay a[G/H]sleep for [C]six whole weeks, [Ami7]They were gonna ask his [G/H]mother to [C]choose [Ami7]When he woke up with not[G/H]hing he said [C]I'll tell something [Ami7]When you've got nothing, you've got [G/H]nothing to [C]lose
<Label:Chorus> Now I've got a [F]hole in my pocket, A [C]hole in my shirt, A [G]whole lot of trouble, he [Ami]said But now the [F]money is gone, well [C]life carries on And I [G]miss it like a hole in the [Ami]head
<Label:Instr> Intro
<Label:Verse> [Ami7]I know a [G/H]woman with [C]kids around her ankles And a [Ami7]baby [G/H]on her [C]lap She said [Ami7]one day her [G/H]husband [C]went to get a paper And the [Ami7]motherf**ker [G/H]never came [C]back [Ami7]Mortgage to [G/H]pay and [C]four kids to raise, But [Ami7]keeping [G/H]wolf from the [C]door She said the [Ami7]wolf's just a [G/H]puppy and the d[C]oor's double locked So w[Ami7]hy you gotta [G/H]worry me [C]for
<Label:Chorus> Now he left a [F]hole in my heart A [C]hole in a promise A [G]hole on the side of my [Ami]bed But n[F]ow that he's gone well l[C]ife carries on And I [G]miss him like a hole in the [Ami]head
Well [F]sometimes you can't [C]change and you can't [G]choose And [F]sometimes it seems you [C]gain less than you [G]lose
Now we've got [Dmi]holes in our [F]hearts Yeah we've got [C]holes in our [G]lives Well we've got [Dmi]holes we got [F]holes but we carry [C]on x 2
Say we've got [Dmi]holes in our [F]hearts Yeah we've got [C]holes in our [G]lives Well we've got [Dmi]holes we got [F]holes but we carry [C]on x 6
song.author: Passenger
song.title: Holes

song.songtext:
Ami C G Já oslí kuklu mám, k mým rolničkám patří smích, F E Ami a smích slyším všude znít, jak procházím světem tím, C světem, který rád tak se chválí sám, G F E Ami že jen k bláznům mám důvěru jít.
R: C G Drápy skal, bytosti bez duší, Ami E svět přízraků, mlčení moruší, F C v ovzduší kouzel, čar zahlédnu pokaždé ten tvar, E Ami E Ami svůj vlastní škleb, zrcadla střep, kejklířův zmar.
Ami C G Pár frašek umím hrát, a k oslavám patří žert F E Ami a čert je má figura, ta nestvůra, kterou dám C rozhřešení vám - vrahům, nevěstkám, G F E Ami úspěch mám a svět je, jak má být.
Ami C G Dmi Bůh ví, že mám už s maskou srostlou tvář, věru mám, Ami C stín v duši, věčný strach, vždyť i ve fraškách, G F E Ami co mám rád, se vás začínám bát.
R.
song.author: Klíč
song.title: Kejklířův zmar

song.songtext:
Dmi G 1. Z předsudků svleč se, promoklas' C Ami naboso budem brouzdat v sobě Dmi G po vodě rozhodíš svůj vlas C E útulně vlhce bude v nás Dmi G jak v dobře zabydleném C Ami jak v dobře zabydleném Dmi E Ami jak v dobře zabydleném zabydleném hrobě
2. Z předsudků svleč se, promoklas' naboso budem brouzdat v sobě hladinu klidu nezčeří ani tvůj sten, jenž s sebou nese po bouřce vlídné příměří po bouřce vlídné příměří po bouřce vlídné příměří, příměří
3. Den - dítě vstoupí do dveří nad dvěma těly rozestře se den - dítě vstoupí do dveří nad dvěma těly rozestře se Na na na...
song.author: Klíč
song.title: Promoklas

song.songtext:
<Note1: Capo 6> Konec řádků s G dát G Gadd4 G
<Label:Intro> [Ami] [Dmi] [C] [Dmi][C] [G] [C][C/H] [Ami] [Dmi][C] [G][Gadd4] [G]
<Label:Verse 1> Well, g[Ami]rey clouds wrapped round the [Fmaj7]town like elastic C[G]ars stood like toys made of T[C]aiwanese p[C/H]lastic The [Ami]boy laughed at the spastic d[Fmaj7]ancing around in the [G]rain [Gadd4] [G] While l[Ami]aundrettes cleaned clothes, high [Fmaj7]heels rub toes P[G]uddles splashed huddles of [C]bus stop [C/H]crows Dr[Ami]essed in their suits and their [Fmaj7]boots, well they all look the [G]same
<Label:Bridge 1> I t[F]ook myself down to the c[G]afe to find all the [C]boys lost in [C/H]books and cr[Ami]ackling [G]vinyl And c[F]arved out a poem a[G]bove the urinal that r[C]ead [C7]
<Label:Chorus> Don't you cr[F]y for the lost, s[G]mile for the living G[C]et what you [C/H]need and give [Ami]what you're given [G] L[F]ife's for the living so l[G]ive it Or you're better off d[Ami]ead
<Label:Instrumental> [Ami] [Dmi][C] [G] [C][C/H] [Ami] [Dmi][C] [G][Gadd4] [G]
<Label:Verse 2> While the [Ami]evening pulled the moon [Fmaj7]out of its packet St[G]ars shone like buttons on an [C]old man's j[C/H]acket We n[Ami]eeded a nail but we t[Fmaj7]acked it till it fell off the w[G]all While p[Ami]igeons pecked drains, sp[Fmaj7]arks flew like planes The r[G]ain showed the rainbows in the [C]oil stai[C/H]ns And we [Ami]all had new iPhones but n[Fmaj7]o one had no one to c[G]all
<Label:Bridge 2> And [F]I stumbled down to the s[G]tomach of the town Where the w[C]idow takes m[C/H]emories to slo[Ami]wly drown [G] With a h[F]and to the sky and a m[G]ist in her eye she s[C]aid [C7]
<Label>Chorus</Label> Don't you cry...
<Label:Instrumental>[Ami][Emi] [F] [C][C/H] [Ami] [Emi] [G][Gadd4] [G]
<Label:Verse 3> Well, I'm s[Ami]ick of this town, this bl[Fmaj7]ind man's forage They t[G]ake your dreams down and st[C]ick them in st[C/H]orage You can h[Ami]ave them back son when you've p[Fmaj7]aid off your mortgage and l[G]oans Yeah, h[Ami]ell with this place, I'll [Fmaj7]go it my own way I'll st[G]ick out my thumb and I tr[C]udge down the [C/H]highway S[Ami]omeday someone must be [Fmaj7]going my way h[G]ome [Gadd4] [G]
<Label:Bridge 3> Till then [F]I'll make my bed from a d[G]isused car With a m[C]attress of l[C/H]eaves and a bl[Ami]anket of stars [G] And I'll st[F]itch the words into my h[G]eart with a needle and thr[C]ead [C7]
<Label>Chorus</Label> Don't you cry...
<Label:Outro> Don't you cr[F]y for the lost Sm[G]ile for the living G[C]et what you [C/H]need and give [Ami]what you're given [G] You know, l[F]ife is for the living so l[G]ive it Or you're better off dead
song.author: Passenger
song.title: Life's for the living

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 4>
<Label:Verse> Well, I hate [C]racist blokes, telling [F]tasteless jokes, And e[C]xplaining where people [G]belong. I hate [C]ignorant folks, who pay m[F]oney to see gigs, And [G]talk through every fucking [C]song. I hate [Ami]people in nightclubs, [F]snorting coke, And [C]explaining where you're going [G]wrong. Well, [Ami]if you agree, come [F]hate it with me, And [G]feel free to sing [C]along.
<Label:Chorus> And it goes [F]la, l[C]a la [G]la [C]la, la la la la, la la la la etc. And it goes [F]la, l[C]a la [G]la la, la la la la, la la la la etc [C] [F] [C] [G] [C] [F] [C] [G]
<Label:Verse> And [C]I hate pointless status [F]updates on Facebook, 'FYI[C]', we were ne[G]ver m8s. We [C]pretend to be friend[F]s on the internet, Yet [G]when in real life we have noth[C]ing to say, Oh, [Ami]brother, I've love for [F]my mother, For [C]good times, for mus[G]ic and for my mates. Ye[Ami]ah, I love and I live, and[F] I have love to give, But [G]sometimes, all you [C]can do is hate.
<Label:Chorus> And it goes ...
<Label:Verse> I [F]hate them fussy eaters, you cook them fajitas, They o[C]nly eat pizza and [G]chips. I hate stepping outside for a smoke, and some guy coughs, Like [C]your lungs are [G]his. And I [Ami]hate queuing up for festival toilets, [F]Especially when you need a [C]shit. I [Ami]hate the X-factor, for [F]murdering music, You [G]bunch of money grabbing [C]pricks.
<Label:Chorus> And it goes...
<Label:Verse> And I [C]hate them magazines, aimed at [F]insecure teens, They make [C]ten year olds chase to grow [G]up. [C]"Hey kids, let's be anorexic", or [F]better, e[G]at chocolate 'til you throw up. Keep your [Ami]Hollywood stars, in their s[F]tupid cars, And the [C]botox, that makes them looked [G]fucked. Just [C]grow old with grace, have you [F]seen Cher's face? It [G]looks like it's been hit by a [C]truck.
<Label>Chorus</Label> And it goes...
song.author: Passenger
song.title: I hate

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 6>
Fingerpicking goes as follows: For Am chord For F chord H|----1--------1--------1--------1-| H|----1--------1--------1--------1--| G|--2--------2--------2--------2---| G|--2--------2--------2--------2----| D|2--------2--------2--------2-----| D|3--------3--------3--------3------|
For C chord For G chord (with a slight variation of the second fret, D string during the chorus) H|----1--------1--------1--------1| H|----0--------0--------0--------0-| G|--0--------0--------0--------0--| G|--0--------0--------0--------0---| D|2--------2--------2--------2----| D|0--------0--------2--------0-----|
<Label:Intro> [Ami] [F] [C] [G] [Ami] [F] [C] [G] <Label:Verse 1> [Ami]Got a pinch of to[F]bacco in my pocket I'[C]m not gonna roll it no I'[G]m not gonna smoke 'til we'[Ami]re staring at the [F]stars and the rockets [C]twinkling in the silvery ni[G]ght [Ami] Two sips of w[F]hiskey in the flask but [C]I'm not gonna drink it I [G]swear I'll make it last 'til [Ami]we're drinking out of [F]the same glass again[C] [G]
<Label:Chorus>[F] And though the [C]sand may be washed by the [G]sea and [G]the old will be lost in [F]the new [C]four will not wait for [G]three, for t[G]hree never waited for t[F]wo and thou[C]gh you may not wait for [G]me, [G] I'll wait [Ami]for you [F] [C] [G] I'll wait fo[Ami]r you x2 [F][C][G]
<Label:Verse 2> [Ami]Got a polaroid pic[F]ture in my wallet, I'[C]m not gonna tear it no I'[G]m not gonna spoil it it's an [Ami]unspoken heartbreak, a [F]heartbroken handshake I [C]take with me where I [G]go [Ami] Three words on the t[F]ip of my tounge not to be s[C]poken or sung or to [G]whispered to anyone 'til I'm [Ami]screaming at the [F]top of my lungs ag[C]ain [G]
<Label:Chorus> And though the...
<Label:Verse 3> [Ami]Got a pinch of to[F]bacco in my pocket I'[C]m not gonna roll it no I'[G]m not gonna smoke 'til we'[Ami]re staring at the [F]stars and the rockets [C]twinkling in the silvery [G]night
song.author: Passenger
song.title: Patient love

song.songtext:
ED
<Label:Verse> [G]Well, I don’t know h[D]ow, and I d[G]on’t know why[Cadd9] [G]But when something’s [D]living, well [G]you can’t say [Cadd9]die [G]You feel like laughi[D]ng, but you [G]start to cry[Cadd9] [G]I don’t know how, an[D]d I don’t k[G]now why [Cadd9]
[G]Well, I don’t have m[D]any, and I [G]don’t have mu[Cadd9]ch [G]In fact I don’t have [D]any, but I[G]'ve got e[Cadd9]nough [G]‘Cause I know those [D]eyes, and I [G]know that to[Cadd9]uch [G]I don’t have many, a[D]nd I don’t [G]have much [Cadd9]
<Label:Chorus> But o[D]h, darling, my he[G]art’s on fire[Cadd9] Oh, d[D]arling, my heart’[G]s on fire [Cadd9] Oh, d[D]arling, my heart’[G]s on fire [Cadd9]
For you
<Label:Instrumental>[G] [D] [G] [Cadd9] [G] [D] [G] [Cadd9]
<Label:Verse> [G]Well, I don’t know w[D]here, and I d[G]on’t know when[Cadd9] [G]But I know [D]we’ll be [G]lovers again [Cadd9] [G]I’ll see you some da[D]y be[G]fore the end [Cadd9] [G]I don’t know wh[D]ere, and I [G]don’t know wh[Cadd9]en
<Label:Chorus> But o[D]h, darling, my he[G]art’s on fire[Cadd9] O[D]h, darling, my he[G]art’s on fire[Cadd9] O[D]h, darling, my he[G]art’s on fire[Cadd9] [D]You know those lo[G]ve songs break your [Cadd9]heart [D]You know those lo[G]ve songs break your [Cadd9]heart [D]You know those lo[G]ve songs break your [Cadd9]heart
<Label:Outro> [D]Oh, darling, my h[G]eart’s on f[Cadd9]ire (x10) For you. [G] [D] [G] [Cadd9] X2
MIKE Capo 7
<Label:Verse> [C]Well, I don’t know h[G]ow, and I d[C]on’t know why [F] [C]But when something’s [G]living, well yo[C]u can’t say d[F]ie [C]You feel like laughi[G]ng, but you [C]start to cry[F] [C]I don’t know how, an[G]d I don’t k[C]now why [F]
[C]Well, I don’t have m[G]any, and I [C]don’t have mu[F]ch [C]In fact I don’t have [G]any, but I[C]'ve got e[F]nough [C]‘Cause I know those [G]eyes, and I [C]know that to[F]uch [C]I don’t have many, a[G]nd I don’t [C]have much [F]
<Label:Chorus> But o[G]h, darling, my he[C]art’s on fire[F] Oh, d[G]arling, my heart’[C]s on fire [F] Oh, d[G]arling, my heart’[C]s on fire [F] For you
<Label:Instrumental> [C][G][C][F] [C][G][C][F]
<Label:Verse> [C]Well, I don’t know w[G]here, and I d[C]on’t know when [F] [C]But I know [G]we’ll be [C]lovers again [F] [C]I’ll see you some da[G]y be[C]fore the end [F] [C]I don’t know wh[G]ere, and I [C]don’t know wh[F]en
<Label:Chorus> But o[G]h, darling, my he[C]art’s on fire[F] O[G]h, darling, my he[C]art’s on fire[F] O[G]h, darling, my he[C]art’s on fire[F] [G]You know those lo[C]ve songs break your [F]heart [G]You know those lo[C]ve songs break your [F]heart [G]You know those lo[C]ve songs break your [F]heart
<Label:Outro> [G]Oh, darling, my h[C]eart’s on f[F]ire (x10) For you. [C] [G] [C] [F] X2
song.author: Passenger
song.title: Hearts on fire

song.songtext:
<Label:Verse 1> Of [Ami]all the trees that grow so fair, old England to adorn, [Fmaj7]Greater are none beneath the sun than [G]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn.
<Label:Chorus Strum Once> Sing [Ami]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn, good sirs, All on a midsummer's [Emi]morn. [Fmaj7]Surely we sing of no little thing In [G]Oak, and Ash, and [Ami]Thorn.
<Label:Verse 2> [Ami]Yew that is old, in churchyard mould, he breedeth a mighty bow [Fmaj7]Alder for shoes do wise men choose, and [G]Beech for cups also But [Ami]when you have killed, and your bowl it is filled, and your shoes are clean outworn [Fmaj7]Back you must speed for all that you need to Oak, and [G]Ash, and Thorn
<Label:Chorus> |: Sing Oak, and Ash, and Thorn... :|
<Label:Verse 3> Elm, she hates mankind and waits, til every gust be laid, To drop a limb on the head of him that anyway trusts her shade, But whether a lad be sober or sad, or mellow with ale from the horn, He'll take no wrong when he lyeth along 'neath Oak, and Ash, and Thorn
<Label:Chorus> Sing Oak, and Ash, and Thorn... Sing [Ami]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn, good sirs, [Ami]All on a midsummer's morn. [Emi] [Fmaj7]Surely we sing of no little thing In [G]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn. [Ami] [Ami] [Ami]
<Label:Verse 4> Oh, do not tell the priest our plight, for he would call it a sin, (A SIN!) But we've been out in the woods all night, a-conjuring summer in, We bring you good news by word of mouth, good news for cattle and corn Sure as the sun come up from the south, by Oak, and Ash, and Thorn. [D] [D] [D]
<Label>Chorus</Label> Sing Oak, and Ash, and Thorn x4
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Oak & Ash & Thorn

song.songtext:
<Label:Verse 1> [D]Fresh out of college, with g[G]rades straight from [D]Hell I [D]browsed for a trade at which [A]I could excel [D]An ad for a ship in [G]need of some [D]manning [D]Men, sails, and purpose, but [A]lacking a [D]captain
<Label:Verse 2> [G]What luck, says I, to [D]find such good fortune! A [A]few white lies later, I [D]ran down the pier [G]Bought me a coat and a [D]cutlass or two [A]Jumped on the deck, and I yelled at the crew:
<Label:Chorus> [G]Hoist up the thing! [D]Batten down the whatsit! [A]What's that thing spinning? [D]Somebody should stop it! [G]Turn hard to port! (That's not port) [D]Now I've got it! [A]Trust me, I'm in cont[D]rol!
<Label:Verse 3> I [D]can't sing the shanties, it [G]has to be [D]said And [D]all of that grog just goes [A]right to my head [D]Whale meat is gross and [G]I miss a girl's [D]laugh [D]Five weeks at sea, even [A]Dave seems a catch!
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Verse 4> [D]We've hit icy waters, no [G]land to be [D]seen [D]The food's getting low and the [A]beer has gone green There's [B]murmurs of discontent [Gmi]under the deck If I [F]don't act fast, it [A]could be my neck!
<Label:Verse 5> So [D]pull up the charts and those [G]weird gold mac[D]hines I [D]see what it says but no [A]clue what it means! Just [D]pull on some levers and [G]yank on some [D]chains [D]Feign a bad back 'til we've [A]landed again
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Out> [G]Hoist up the thing! [D]Batten down the whatsit! [A]What's that thing spinning? Some[D]body should stop it! (BLOODY HELL!) [G]Turn hard to port! (This is SHERRY!) [D]Now I've got it! (Screaming) [A]Trust me, I'm [G]in con[D]trol! (MOMMY) [A]Trust me, I'm in con[D]trol!
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Hoist up the thing

song.songtext:
<Label:Verse 1> The [Dmi]Diamond is a [C]ship, me lads, for the [Dmi]Davis Strait we're [Ami]bound, the [Dmi]quay it is all [Ami]garnished with [F]bonny l[C]asses 'r[Dmi]ound; Captain [Dmi]Thompson gives the [C]orders to [Dmi]sail the ocean [Ami]wide, Where the [Dmi]sun it never [Ami]sets, me lads, nor [F]darkness [C]dims the [Dmi]sky
<Label:Chorus> For it's [Dmi]cheer up me lads, let your [F]hearts never fail, For the [C]bonny ship, the Diamond, goes a-f[G]ishing for the whale. For it's [Dmi]cheer up me lads, let your [F]hearts never fail, For the [G]bonny ship, the Diamond, goes a-f[G]ishing f[F]or the w[Dmi]hale. [Dmi][C][Dmi][Ami] [Dmi][Ami][F][C] [Dmi]
<Label:Verse 2> A[Dmi]long the quay of [Ami]Peterhead, the [Dmi]lasses stand [Ami]around, Wi' [Dmi]shawls all pulled a[Ami]round them and the [F]salt tears [C]runnin' [Dmi]down; Well [Dmi]don't you weep, my [Ami]bonny lass, though y[Dmi]ou'll be left beh[Ami]ind, For the [Dmi]rose will bloom on [Ami]Greenland's ice be[F]fore we [C]change our [Dmi]mind
<Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads...
<Label:Verse 3> Here's a [Dmi]health to the Reso[Ami]lution, like[Dmi]wise the Eliza [Ami]Swan, Three [Dmi]cheers to the Battler [Ami]of Montrose and the [F]Diamond, [C]ship of [Dmi]fame; We [Dmi]wear the trousers [Ami]of the white and [Dmi]jackets of the [Ami]blue, When [Dmi]we get back to [Ami]Peterhead, we'll [F]have sweet[C]hearts a[Dmi]new,
<Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads...
<Label:Verse 4> It [Dmi]will be bright both [Ami]day and night when [Dmi]Greenland lads come [Ami]hame, Our [Dmi]ship full up with [Ami]oil, my lads, and [F]money [C]to our [D]name; We'll [Dmi]make the cradles [Ami]for to rock and the [Dmi]blankets for to [Ami]tear, And [Dmi]every lass in [Ami]Peterhead sing: "[F]Husha[C]bye, my [Dmi]dear"
<Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads... <Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads...
<Label:Outro> [Dmi][Ami][F][G] [Dmi][Ami][G][C] [Dmi]
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Bonny ship the diamond

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 4> <Label:Verse 1> [Ami]Watch that old [C]fire as it [G]flickers and [Ami]dies That [C]once blessed the h[G]ousehold and [D]lit up our lives It s[C]hone for the f[D]riends and the c[Ami]linking of g[G]lasses I'll [Ami]tend to the [C]flame; you can [G]worship the a[Ami]shes
<Label:Verse 2> Capture the wild things and bring them in line And own what was never your right to confine The lives and the loves and the songs are what matters I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
<Label:Verse 3> Do you feel heavy? Your eyes drop with grief Your spirit is wild and your suffering is brief So never you buckle and bend to the masses I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
<Label:Verse 4> Get round the fire with a glass of strong ale And tell us a story from beyond the pale Bury some seeds and expect some strong branches I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
<Label:Verse 5> Now show me a man that can meet all his needs For what we need most now is unity's seed: A common old song for all creeds and all classes I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes I'll [Ami]tend to the flame [E]...
<Label:Verse 6> What will we do when the world it is ending And time it is halted for friend and for foe? Try to hold on to the time as it passes I'll [Ami]tend to the [C]flame; you can [G]worship the a[Ami]shes I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Ashes

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 6>
<Label:Verse 1> [G]Well I am the [G]boy who cried wolf And [C]I know I've lied in the [C]past But [Dadd4]last night I saw his [C]yellow eyes shining in the dark [G] [G]Yeah I know I spun [G]tales with this voice And I [C]opened my mouth too [C]fast But [Dadd4]last night I saw his [C]footprints in the path[G]
<Label:Chorus 1> Well, [Dadd4]I could swim every [C]sea, from south pole to [G]north But [Dadd4]I know I'll only ever [C]be the boy who cried [G]wolf
<Label:Verse 2> [G]Well I am the [G]shepherd's only son [C]And I know what a [C]joke I've become I've an [Dadd4]honest heart but I've [Dadd4]lies on my tongue I don't [G]know how it started or [G]where it came from And [G]you have no reason and [G]I have no proof But [C]this time I swear I'm [C]telling the truth I [Dadd4]saw that old wolf from [Dadd4]tail to tooth And I [G]know that he's hungry, and he's [G]coming down too
<Label:Chorus 2> Well, [Dadd4]I could swim every [C]sea from south pole to [G]north And [Dadd4]I could climb every [C]tree, scale every [G]course And [Dadd4]I could tell only the [C]truth from this day [Emi]forth[G/F#][G] But [C]I know I'll ever [Dadd4]be the boy who cried [G]wolf
<Label:Outro> Oh-[C]oh I [Dadd4]am the boy who cried [G]wolf Oh-oh-oh-[C]oh I [Dadd4]am the boy who cried...[G]
song.author: Passenger
song.title: The boy who cried wolf

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 2> [G][C][G][C]
<Label:Verse> I feel your [G]head resting heavy on your [C]single bed I want to [G]hear all about it Get it [C]all off your chest, oh [G]I feel the tears and you’re [C]not alone, oh [G]When I hold you, well I [C]won’t let go, oh
<Label:Chorus> [G]Why should [C]we care for what they’re [D]selling us [C]anyway [G]We’re so [C]younger than you [D]know, whoa [G]You don’t have to be [C]there, b[G]abe [G]You don’t have to be [C]scared, [G]babe You don’t ne[C]ed a p[G]lan of wh[C]at you wan[G]na do Won’t you l[C]isten to the [G]man that’s [D]loving y[G]ou
<Label:Verse> [G]Your world keeps spinning and you [C]can’t jump off But I will [G]catch you if you fall I can’t [C]tell you enough [G]I hate to hear that you’re [C]feeling low [G]I hate to hear that you [C]won’t come home
<Label:Chorus> Why should ... loving you, [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa
<Label:Bridge> [Emi]Easy, easy and a [C]one, two, three, oh [Emi]Easy, breezy if you [C]come with me, oh [Emi]Easy, easy and a [C]one, two, three, four, [Hmi]five, six, seven eight, [C]nine, nine, nine, nine.
<Label:Outro> [G]You don’t have to be [C]there, [G]babe [G]You don’t have to be [C]scared, [G]babe You don’t [C]need a p[G]lan of wh[C]at you wa[G]nna do Won’t you l[C]isten to the [G]man that’s [D]loving y[G]ou [G]You don’t have to be [C]there, b[G]abe [G]You don’t have to be [C]scared, [G]babe You don’t [C]need a p[G]lan of w[C]hat you wa[G]nna do Won’t you l[C]isten to the [G]man that’s [D]loving you, [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa[D], [G]whoa
song.author: George Ezra
song.title: Listen to the man

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 4> [G] [D] [C] [G]
<Label:Verse 1> [G]Look at the stars Look how they shine for [D]you And everything you do [Cmaj7] Yeah, they were all yellow [G]I came along I wrote a song for [D]you And all the things you do [Cmaj7] And it was called "Yellow." [G]So then I took my [D]turn Oh what a thing to have done [Cmaj7] And it was all yellow [G] [Gsus4]
<Label:Chorus 1> [Cmaj7]Your skin [Emi7]Oh yeah, [D]your skin and bones [Cmaj7]Turn in[Emi7]to something [D]beautiful [Cmaj7]You know, [Emi7]you know I [D]love you so [Cmaj7] You know I love you so
[G] [D] [C] [G] [Gsus4]
<Label:Verse 2> [G]I swam across I jumped across for [D]you Oh, what a thing to do[Cmaj7] 'Cause you were all yellow [G]I drew a line I drew a line for [D]you Oh, what a thing to do[Cmaj7] And it was all yellow[G] [Gsus4]
<Label:Chorus 2> [C]Your skin [Emi7]Oh yeah, your [D]skin and bones [Cmaj7]Turn in[Emi7]to something [D]beautiful [Cmaj7]And you know [Emi7]For you I [D]bleed myself [Cmaj7]dry For you I bleed myself dry
[G] [D] [C] [G] [Gsus4]
<Label:Bridge> I[G]t's true, look how they shine for y[D]ou Look how they shine for [Cmaj7]you Look how they shine for [G] Look how they shine for [D]you Look how they shine for [Cmaj7]you
Look how they shine
<Label:Outro> [G]Look at the stars Look how they shine for [Dmi7]you And all the things that you[Cmaj7] do
song.author: Coldplay
song.title: Yellow

song.songtext:
<Note1: Capo 1> [C][D][G][Emi] [C][D][G][Emi]
<Label:Verse 1> I used to [C]rule the [D]world Seas would [G]rise when I gave the [Emi]word Now in the morning I [C]sleep a[D]lone Sweep the [G]streets I used to [Emi]own
[C][D][G][Emi] [C][D][G][Emi]
<Label:Verse 2> I used to [C]roll the [D]dice Feel the [G]fear in my enemy's [Emi]eyes Listen as the [C]crowd would [D]sing: "Now the [G]old king is dead! Long [Emi]live the king!" One minute I [C]held the [D]key Next the [G]walls were closed on [Emi]me And I discovered that my [C]castles [D]stand Upon [G]pillars of salt and pill[Emi]ars of sand
<Label:Chorus> I [C]hear Jerusalem [D]bells are ringing [G]Roman Cavalry [Emi]choirs are singing [C]Be my mirror, my [D]sword, and shield My [G]missionaries in a [Emi]foreign field [C]For some reason I [D]can't explain [G]Once you go there was [Emi]never, never an [C]honest [D]word That was [Hmi]when I ruled the [Emi]world
[C][D][G][Emi] [C][D][G][Emi]
<Label:Verse 3> It was the wicked and [C]wild [D]wind Blew down the [G]doors to let me [Emi]in. Shattered windows and the [C]sound of [D]drums People [G]couldn't believe what [Emi]I'd become Revolutio[C]naries [D]wait For my [G]head on a silver [Emi]plate Just a puppet on a [C]lonely [D]string Oh [G]who would ever want to be [Emi]king?
<Label:Chorus 2> I [C]hear Jerusalem [D]bells are ringing [G]Roman Cavalry [Emi]choirs are singing [C]Be my mirror, my [D]sword, and shield My [G]missionaries in a [Emi]foreign field [C]For some reason I [D]can't explain I [G]know Saint Peter won't [Emi]call my name, never an [C]honest [D]word But that was [Hmi]when I ruled the [Emi]world
<Label:Interlude> [C][Emi] [C][Emi] [C][Emi] [D] [D] Oh[C]hhhh[D]h Oh[G]hhhh[Emi]hh Oh[C]hhhh[D]h Oh[G]hhhh[Emi]hh
<Label:Chorus 2>
<Label:Outro> [C]Ooooo[D]h [Hmi]Ooooo[Emi]oh [C]Ooooo[D]h [Hmi]Ooooo[Emi]oh
song.author: Coldplay
song.title: Viva la vida

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 3> <Label:Intro> [Hmi7] [G] [D] [Dsus2] | x2
<Label:Verse>[Hmi7] Come up to me[G]et you, tell you I'm s[D]orry You don't know how l[Dsus2]ovely you are [Hmi7] I had to find [G]you, tell you I need [D]you, Tell you I’ll [Dsus2]set you apart [Hmi7] Tell me your se[G]crets, and’ask me your ques[D]tions Oh, let’s go ba[Dsus2]ck to the start [Hmi7] Running in ci[G]rcles, coming up ta[D]ils, Heads on a scie[Dsus2]nce apart
<Label:Chorus> [G] Nobody said it was easy [D] It's such a [Dsus2]shame for us to part [G] Nobody said it was easy [D] No one ever [A/D]said it would be [D6/9]this har[A/E]d. [Asus4][A] Oh take me back to the start...
<Label:Instrumental> [D] [G] [D] [D] [Dmaj7] [Hmi7] [G] [D] [Dsus2]
<Label:Verse> [Hmi7] I was just gue[G]ssing at numbers and fi[D]gures Pulling the puzzl[Dsus2]es apart [Hmi7] Questions of sci[G]ence, science and pro[D]gress Do not speak as lou[Dsus2]d as my heart [Hmi7] Tell me you lov[G]e me, come back and haunt [D]me Oh, and I rush [Dsus2]to the start [Hmi7] Running in ci[G]rcles, chasing our ta[D]ils
Coming back as we [Dsus2/C#]are
<Label:Chorus> Nobody said ... hard. I’m going back to the start.
<Label:Instrumental> [D] [G] [D] [D]
[Hmi7] [G] [D] [D] Oooooooooooooooohh x4 [Hmi7] [G] [D] Oooooooooooooooohh
song.author: Coldplay
song.title: The scientist

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 3> <Label:Intro> [C] [Emi] [Ami7] [Emi/G] [C] [Emi] [Ami7] [Emi/G]
<Label:Verse 1> When you t[C]ry your best, but you [Emi]don't succ[Ami7] eed [Emi/G] When you g[C]et what you want, but [Emi]not what you [Ami7]need [Emi/G] When you f[C]eel so tired, but you [Emi]can't sle[Ami7]ep [Emi/G] Stuck in rev[C]er[Emi][Ami7]se. [Emi/G]
<Label:Verse 2> When the t[C]ears come streaming do[Emi]wn your f[Ami7]ace [Emi/G] When you l[C]ose something you [Emi]can't rep[Ami7]lace [Emi/G] When you l[C]ove someone, but it go[Emi]es to was[Ami7]te [Emi/G] Could it be [C]wo[Emi] - [Ami7]rse? [Emi/G]
<Label:Chorus> [F] Lights [C]will [G]gu[Gsus4]ide you ho[F]me And [C]ig[G]n[Gsus4]ite your bo[F]nes And I [C]will [G]try[Gsus4] to fix you
[C] [Emi] [Ami7] [G] [C] [Emi] [Ami7] [G]
<Label:Verse 3> And h[C]igh up above or [Emi]down bel[Ami7]ow [Emi/G] When you're t[C]oo in love to [Emi]let it [Ami7]go [Emi/G] If you n[C]ever try, then you'll [Emi]never [Ami7]know [Emi/G] Just what you're [C]wo[Emi]r[Ami7]th [Emi/G]
<Label:Chorus> [F]Lights [C]will [G]gu[Gsus4]ide you ho[F]me And [C]ig[G]n[Gsus4]ite your bo[F]nes And I [C]will [G]try[Gsus4] to fix you
<Label:Solo> [C] [F] [C] [G] [Ami7] [F] [C] [G] [C] [F] [C] [Emi] [Ami7] [F] [C] [G]
<Label:Bridge> [C]Tears stream, [F]down your face [C]When you lose something [G]you cannot replace [Ami7]Tears stream do[F]wn your face [C]And I...[G]......
[C]Tears stream, [F]down your face [C]I promise you I will [Emi]learn from my mistakes [Ami7]Tears stream do[F]wn your face [C]And I...[G]......
<Label:Chorus> [F]Lights [C]will [G]gu[Gsus4]ide you ho[F]me And [C]ig[G]n[Gsus4]ite your bo[F]nes And I [C]will [G]try[Gsus4] to fix y[C]ou
song.author: Coldplay
song.title: Fix you

song.songtext:
<Note1: Capo 6> [Ami] [F] [C] [Emi] [Ami] [F] [C] [Emi]
<Label:Verse 1>[Ami] Cause you're a [F]sky, cause you're a [C]sky full of st[Emi]ars [Ami] I'm gonna [F]give you my he[C]art [Emi] [Ami] Cause you're a [F]sky, cause you're a [C]sky full of st[Emi]ars [Ami] Cause you [F]light up the pat[C]h [Emi]
<Label:Chorus> [Ami] I don't ca[F]re, go on and [C]tear me apart[Emi] [Ami] I don't ca[F]re if you do[C] [Emi] [Ami] Cause in a [F]sky, cause in a [C]sky full of stars [Emi] I think I saw [Ami]you [F] [C] [Emi]
<Label:Instrumental> [Ami] [F] [C] [Emi] x3
<Label:Verse 2> [Ami] Cause you're a [F]sky, cause you're a [C]sky full of st[Emi]ars [Ami] I wanna [F]die in your ar[C]ms, oh[Emi] [Ami] Cause you get [F]lighter the [C]more it gets [Emi]dark [Ami] I'm gonna [F]give you my he[C]art [Emi]
<Label:Chorus> [Ami]I don't ca[F]re, go on and [C]tear me apart [Emi] [Ami] I don't ca[F]re if you do[C] [Emi] [Ami] Cause in a [F]sky, cause in a [C]sky full of stars [Emi] I think I see [Ami]you [F] [C] [Emi] I think I see [Ami]you [F] [Emi]
<Label:Instrumental> [Ami][F] [C] [Emi] x4 [F] [G] [Ami] [C] x2
<Label:Outro> [F]Because you're a s[G]ky, you're a s[Ami]ky full of st[C]ars Such a heavenly [F]view [G] [Ami] [C] Such a heavenly [F]view [G] [Ami] [C] [F] [G] [Ami] [C] x3
song.author: Coldplay
song.title: A sky full of stars
